title: R E N G A R
body: So when are the Rengar changes coming out? After the e changes, Rengar just feels clunky and useless. I'm sure there is going to be those people saying " rengar can still 1 shot ", yeah if you get lucky and they actually let you bola on time for the assassination. As a Rengar main since season 3,  I gotta admit Rengar is almost unplayable. Provides almost nothing for the team anymore pre 6 even after...

replies.body:
Try tank Rengar Top.

You can still get your Youmuus and Hydra, but you get a Sunfire Cape, maybe a Warmogs, sometimes a Dead Man's Plate, and take Grasp of the Undying it is SUPER strong.
